msg: Put a test on the "this.args" to prevent lookup_popup2 from blowing up if there are none.

author: esm
msg: [PLUTO-186]: implementing tooltips for the portlet mode anchor.
* Adds ToolTips.java class encapsulating access to the bundle
* Updates PortletModeAnchor to emit the needed HTML
* Updates pluto.css, adding in the tooltip related CSS

author: hlship
msg: Extend the ExceptionReport page, adding a new RenderObject component with an underlying ObjectRenderer service.
Add customized object rendering for Request and Location.
Improve the readability of the default ExceptionReport page (via improvements to default.css).
